Key Match Events: Rashid Khan took 3-26 and Fazalhaq Farooqi 3-33
Suryakumar Yadav top-scored with 53 off 28 balls
Afghanistan was bowled out for 134 off the final ball
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan captain Rashid Khan said, 'We could have executed smarter. My bowling has been coming out well, I struggled early in the IPL but I am hitting the right areas consistently, but it's the match result that matters most.'

India captain Rohit Sharma said, 'The last two years we've played T20s here, so we understand the conditions and planned accordingly. We adapted well and got 180, which was a great effort from the batters. We had class bowlers who defended it perfectly.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ten catches were taken in the innings
Bumrah was the pick of the bowlers with 3-7
